level.heading: Sale of jewelry.
level.text: ยง 20-284 Sale of jewelry. a. Each auctioneer shall cause to be delivered to the purchaser of diamonds, precious stones or other jewelry, a signed document containing a description of the article sold and the representations made in regard thereto at the time of the sale. b. Each article of jewelry sold at public auction shall have affixed thereto a tag, on which shall be printed or written a correct description of such article.
